CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Controlling Topic highlights on SharePoint
CurrentVersion.description: The long-awaited feature to control what Topics get highlighted on SharePoint pages and news posts with an alternative user experience to discover Topics on the page. This item is no longer accurate and is being removed from the roadmap.  We apologize for any inconvenience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Controlling Topic highlights on SharePoint
OldVersion.description: The long-awaited feature to control what Topics get highlighted on SharePoint pages and news posts with an alternative user experience to discover Topics on the page.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Topics Teams app
CurrentVersion.description:
Viva Topics Teams app as the new destination for
discovering new and trending topics in the organization, providing feedback on
suggested topics, catching up on activities on topics of interest and more. This item is no longer accurate and is being removed from the roadmap.  We apologize for any inconvenience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Topics Teams app
OldVersion.description:
Viva Topics Teams app as the new destination for
discovering new and trending topics in the organization, providing feedback on
suggested topics, catching up on activities on topics of interest and more.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Search: Microsoft Graph connector crawl failure notifications in Service Health dashboard
CurrentVersion.description: Admins get a notification in the Service Health dashboard when Microsoft Graph connectors crawl fails. This item is no longer accurate and is being removed from the roadmap.  We apologize for any inconvenience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Search: Microsoft Graph connector crawl failure notifications in Service Health dashboard
OldVersion.description: Admins get a notification in the Service Health dashboard when Microsoft Graph connectors crawl fails.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Integration of Auto-Claim Policy for Licensing of Microsoft Loop and Microsoft Clipchamp in your Tenant
CurrentVersion.description: We're excited to announce an upcoming feature to enhance our Microsoft 365 offerings with a new, innovative auto-claim policy for Microsoft Loop and Microsoft Clipchamp. These two applications can be configured as a policy, allowing users with active base offerings like Microsoft 365 E3/E5 Original SKUs to automatically claim a Microsoft 365 Extra Features E3/E5 license when needed. As they engage with Microsoft Loop and Microsoft Clipchamp, a license from your tenant's pre-provisioned Microsoft 365 Extra Features E3/E5 SKU will be seamlessly assigned to them. This new feature is designed to simplify admin tasks and requirements.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Integration of Auto-Claim Policy for Licensing of Microsoft Loop and Microsoft Clipchamp in your Tenant
OldVersion.description: We're excited to announce an upcoming feature to enhance our Microsoft 365 offerings with a new, innovative auto-claim policy for Microsoft Loop and Microsoft Clipchamp. These two applications can be configured as a policy, allowing users with active base offerings like Microsoft 365 E3/E5 Original SKUs to automatically claim a Microsoft 365 Extra Features E3/E5 license when needed. As they engage with Microsoft Loop and Microsoft Clipchamp, a license from your tenant's pre-provisioned Microsoft 365 Extra Features E3/E5 SKU will be seamlessly assigned to them. This new feature is designed to simplify admin tasks and requirements.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Enhanced app discovery
CurrentVersion.description: With enhanced app discovery users can easily discover and use apps they've previously used in group chats, channels, and meetings, allowing them to consent to use the app everywhere in Teams with one click.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Enhanced app discovery
OldVersion.description: With enhanced app discovery users can easily discover and use apps they've previously used in group chats, channels, and meetings, allowing them to consent to use the app everywhere in Teams with one click.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Admins enabled to make bulk employee ID updates
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will enable Viva Glint service admins to make bulk employee ID updates in the web app.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Admins enabled to make bulk employee ID updates
OldVersion.description: This feature will enable Viva Glint service admins to make bulk employee ID updates in the web app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365: Multi-Geo In-Region Routing
CurrentVersion.description: Multi-Geo In-Region Routing (IRR) enables customers to control the routing of inbound emails to comply with regional data regulations. Using IRR, customers can set the geo-region that inbound mail should be routed to for specific Accepted Domains. By setting Accepted Domains to specific geo-regions and then adding users to that Accepted Domain that are located in the same geo-region as the Accepted Domain is set to route mail to, IRR ensures that emails are fully processed and stored in the user's region. This keeps data within the user’s Preferred Data Location (PDL), enhancing data sovereignty and compliance.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365: Multi-Geo In-Region Routing
OldVersion.description: Multi-Geo In-Region Routing (IRR) enables customers to control the routing of inbound emails to comply with regional data regulations. IRR ensures emails sent to users within specific geo-regions are processed and stored in their respective region. By directing emails to Accepted Domains that are associated with specific geo-regions and users located in those same geo-regions, IRR ensures that emails are fully processed and stored in the user's region. This keeps data within the user’s Preferred Data Location (PDL), enhancing data sovereignty and compliance.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent recap support for ad-hoc meetings and calls
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent recap is available for ad-hoc meetings and calls, like those started from ‘Meet now’ and started from chat. Now, Teams Premium and Copilot for Microsoft 365 licensed users can easily browse the recording by speakers and topics, as well as access AI-generated notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions after the ad-hoc meeting ends.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent recap support for ad-hoc meetings and calls
OldVersion.description: Intelligent recap is available for ad-hoc meetings and calls, like those started from ‘Meet now’ and started from chat. Now, Teams Premium and Copilot for Microsoft 365 licensed users can easily browse the recording by speakers and topics, as well as access AI-generated notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions after the ad-hoc meeting ends.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Notes powered by Loop now available for Microsoft 365 GCC High and DoD
CurrentVersion.description: Teams Notes, powered by Loop, is now available for Microsoft 365 GCC High and DoD environments. Teams Notes are Loop components in Teams meetings and chats that allow end users to co-create and collaborate on their meeting agenda, notes, and action items that can be co-authored and edited by everyone. Since Notes are Loop components, they stay in sync across all the places they have been shared. Assigned Tasks automatically sync with ToDo and Planner.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Notes powered by Loop now available for Microsoft 365 GCC High and DoD
OldVersion.description: Teams Notes, powered by Loop, is now available for Microsoft 365 GCC High and DoD environments. Teams Notes are Loop components in Teams meetings and chats that allow end users to co-create and collaborate on their meeting agenda, notes, and action items that can be co-authored and edited by everyone. Since Notes are Loop components, they stay in sync across all the places they have been shared. Assigned Tasks automatically sync with ToDo and Planner.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Custom question benchmark mapping
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Glint survey creators will be able to associate a custom question with a Viva Glint benchmark to leverage the benchmark in the reporting UI.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Custom question benchmark mapping
OldVersion.description: Viva Glint survey creators will be able to associate a custom question with a Viva Glint benchmark to leverage the benchmark in the reporting UI.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Data Loss Prevention (DLP) Policy tips revamp for New Outlook
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing new and improved DLP Policy tips in New Outlook for all E5 users. New DLP will support top DLP predicates and exceptions, all advanced classifiers, and override capabilities for E5 users. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Data Loss Prevention (DLP) Policy tips revamp for New Outlook
OldVersion.description: Introducing new and improved DLP Policy tips in New Outlook for all E5 users. New DLP will support top DLP predicates and exceptions, all advanced classifiers, and override capabilities for E5 users. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Updates for font management capabilities
CurrentVersion.description: We are introducing updates that provide capabilities for managing custom fonts for SharePoint and Viva Connections. This includes the ability to hide the From Microsoft font packages from Change the look, apply a font package in your site templates, and updated availability for the From Microsoft font packages.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Updates for font management capabilities
OldVersion.description: We are introducing updates that provide capabilities for managing custom fonts for SharePoint and Viva Connections. This includes the ability to hide the From Microsoft font packages from Change the look, apply a font package in your site templates, and updated availability for the From Microsoft font packages.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Detect Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 interactions template
CurrentVersion.description: Communication Compliance is introducing a new template dedicated to analyzing all Copilot for Microsoft 365 prompts and response to help ensure content prohibited by customers’ policies, such as harassing or threatening language, is not being used in Copilot for Microsoft 365 interfaces. This scales Communication Compliance’s reach, consistent with Microsoft 365’s expanding interfaces. In addition, administrators are also able to select Copilot chats as a checked location in the policy creation wizard for any new or existing policies. This empowers administrators to fine-tune their management strategy precisely to their organization’s needs, with a focus on user privacy protection. Whether it's setting specific conditions or deploying trainable classifiers, this feature provides flexibility and adaptability in compliance management, ensuring your organization's communications remain secure, compliant, and respectful of user privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Detect Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 interactions template
OldVersion.description: Communication Compliance is introducing a new template dedicated to analyzing all Copilot for Microsoft 365 prompts and response to help ensure content prohibited by customers’ policies, such as harassing or threatening language, is not being used in Copilot for Microsoft 365 interfaces. This scales Communication Compliance’s reach, consistent with Microsoft 365’s expanding interfaces. In addition, administrators are also able to select Copilot chats as a checked location in the policy creation wizard for any new or existing policies. This empowers administrators to fine-tune their management strategy precisely to their organization’s needs, with a focus on user privacy protection. Whether it's setting specific conditions or deploying trainable classifiers, this feature provides flexibility and adaptability in compliance management, ensuring your organization's communications remain secure, compliant, and respectful of user privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Delayed simultaneous ring setting
CurrentVersion.description: For teams with shared call responsibilities, delayed simultaneous ring will ensure calls configure the intended recipient first, instead of notifying everyone the moment a call comes in.  This helps reduce noise and minimizes distractions —especially for roles like delegates and customer service teams.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Delayed simultaneous ring setting
OldVersion.description: For teams with shared call responsibilities, delayed simultaneous ring will ensure calls configure the intended recipient first, instead of notifying everyone the moment a call comes in.  This helps reduce noise and minimizes distractions —especially for roles like delegates and customer service teams.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Ask Copilot questions about images
CurrentVersion.description: Now, you can ask questions about images stored in your OneDrive. Select up to 5 images and ask questions like explaining the contents of an image or extracting relevant text from an image. This feature requires a Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 license and will be available to commercial customers on OneDrive Web.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Shared tab in channel
CurrentVersion.description: he Files tab in channels is now "Shared". In addition to files that are currently shown from document library, new experience will also show all the files and links shared in the channel conversations. This makes it easier to find content all in one place.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Tag Mentions filter in Activity
CurrentVersion.description: To view all your tag mentions, select the tag mentions filter in your activity feed. The ‘@Mentions’ filter allows you to catch up quickly on personal mentions, while the ‘Tag mentions’ filter helps you catch up on the Tag mentions you are part of.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Message recall in the Outlook app for iOS and Android
CurrentVersion.description: From the Outlook for iOS and Android apps, you can request Outlook to attempt to recall a message sent to a colleague within your organization

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Enhanced User Settings experience in Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: Modernized user experience for leveraging general and notification settings within Viva Engage

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Relevance recommendation for Message Center posts
CurrentVersion.description: The new relevance recommendation in Message Center will help you determine how relevant a change is to your tenant. The recommendation (high, medium, or low) will be determined based on multiple factors, such as service usage and the type of change.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Relevance recommendation for Message Center posts
OldVersion.description: The new relevance recommendation in Message Center will help you determine how relevant a change is to your tenant. The recommendation (high, medium, or low) will be determined based on multiple factors, such as service usage and the type of change. We have paused the rollout to improve the recommendation, prior to proceeding and have adjusted the status to reflect this. Thank you for your patience.
